This technique allows the user to take remote control over rocks, levitating and moving them around.

== Trivia ==
* Similar to many techniques from [[Kumogakure]], the name for this technique is an English word given kanji that somewhat matches its pronunciation.

[[fr:Doton - Drone]]
[[tr:Toprak Tipi: Parazit]]
